title: Colin Sits Down with FOX Sports Radio and FS1 Host Clay Travis
itunes:title: Colin Sits Down with FOX Sports Radio and FS1 Host Clay Travis
description:
Colin talks with Fox Sports Radio and FS1's Clay Travis.  They talk about the insanity of the mob on Twitter, the democratic debates and what college football is doing wrong that is leading to decreased attendance in this exclusive podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
